# selectionForEntireDocument

**Instance Property**

Returns a selection representing the textual content of the entire document.

## Declaration

```swift
var selectionForEntireDocument: PDFSelection? { get }
```

## Working with Selections and Searches

- **selection(from:atCharacterIndex:to:atCharacterIndex:)**: Returns the specified selection based on starting and ending character indexes.
- **selection(from:at:to:at:)**: Returns the specified selection based on starting and ending points.
- **Search Operations**: Find and search in PDFs.

items.description: Returns the specified selection based on starting and ending character indexes.
items.name: selection(from:atCharacterIndex:to:atCharacterIndex:)

items.description: Returns the specified selection based on starting and ending points.
items.name: selection(from:at:to:at:)
